name: FortniteNews
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fortnite news
des:
Ask to your Alexa : "Alexa fortnite news", it will replay with the latest updates on your favorite game.
Dont waste your time on research , ask directly to alexa and let her read the news for you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
